taxonomicnotes: Partial sequence information of 16Sr RNA and Cytochrome C Oxidase 1 (CO1) of P. fasciata from Kerala and from the Mekong River basin was found to be significantly different (A. Gopalakrishnan. pers. comm. 2010). It is possible that the Kerala population can be P. malabaricus (Day 1878).
rationale: Pristolepis fasciata is assessed as Least Concern in view of its wide distribution, presumed large overall population, and because it is unlikely to be declining fast enough to qualify for listing in a more threatened category. The presence of this species in India is doubtful, based on genetic studies.
evaluator: Madhusoodana Kurup, B., Basheer, V.S., Anna Mercy, T.V. & Cox, N.A.
